definition: dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: Sleepwalking is one of the disturbances of consciousness that fall in the scope of psychopaths.
sentences.chinese: 夢遊症是精神病中意識障礙的一種。

sentences.english: After fit, the next day before dawn turns not easily wake, and constant companion has somnambulism .
sentences.chinese: 發作後，翌日凌晨不易轉醒，且常伴有夢遊症。

sentences.english: Doctors say that sleepwalking is much more commonthan is generally supposed.
sentences.chinese: 醫生說，夢遊症比人們通常認爲的要常見得多。

sentences.english: I think that is like sleepwalking.
